item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: My prescription for a training regimen is always what you enjoy doing. After all, while we all may like to dream about it, few of us are seriously aiming for becoming a professional and thus the important of keeping it fun and simple to maintain is key. So in light of that, I say keep on with your game memorizations! Any kind of work you put into the game will have long term effects in my opinion. Of course, a little dose of tsumego and tesuji will also do your future self a bit of good as well. Haha.
item.content:encoded:
My prescription for a training regimen is always what you enjoy doing. After all, while we all may like to dream about it, few of us are seriously aiming for becoming a professional and thus the important of keeping it fun and simple to maintain is key.
So in light of that, I say keep on with your game memorizations! Any kind of work you put into the game will have long term effects in my opinion.
Of course, a little dose of tsumego and tesuji will also do your future self a bit of good as well. Haha.

item.title: By: gekkoe
item.dc:creator: gekkoe
item.description: Currently about half way through memorizing the "Ear-Reddening Game" with commentary from Invincible. Fun stuff.
item.content:encoded: Currently about half way through memorizing the “Ear-Reddening Game” with commentary from Invincible. Fun stuff.

item.title: By: gekkoe
item.dc:creator: gekkoe
item.description: That reminds me... I keep meaning to hook up with you for a game or two. I'm on the west coast, and am a bit of a night owl. What sort of hours are you usually available to play?
item.content:encoded:
That reminds me… I keep meaning to hook up with you for a game or two.
I’m on the west coast, and am a bit of a night owl. What sort of hours are you usually available to play?

item.title: By: gekkoe
item.dc:creator: gekkoe
item.description: I haven't set a solid regimen as yet, but I've been studying at least a couple hours a day, and have been really enjoying memorizing some pro games by players that I admire. I like to get the commentated ones (especially with really detailed commentators like Yuan Zhou) so that I can have some hope of understanding some of what's going on. I realize that memorizing games is not what every teacher would recommend at my level (10k-ish) but it's easy for me, and I enjoy it, and I strongly suspect that it is helping me on a subconscious level to better understand good haengma, etc. Need to get back to doing some more tsumego and tesuji though too.
item.content:encoded:
I haven’t set a solid regimen as yet, but I’ve been studying at least a couple hours a day, and have been really enjoying memorizing some pro games by players that I admire.
I like to get the commentated ones (especially with really detailed commentators like Yuan Zhou) so that I can have some hope of understanding some of what’s going on.
I realize that memorizing games is not what every teacher would recommend at my level (10k-ish) but it’s easy for me, and I enjoy it, and I strongly suspect that it is helping me on a subconscious level to better understand good haengma, etc.
Need to get back to doing some more tsumego and tesuji though too.

item.title: By: Darrell Malick
item.dc:creator: Darrell Malick
item.description: I've been steady-on for a while now, but company just arrived to stay for two weeks. It'll be a test of my determination. We should play a game sometime! We're fairly close in rank I think.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been steady-on for a while now, but company just arrived to stay for two weeks. It’ll be a test of my determination. We should play a game sometime! We’re fairly close in rank I think.
